Package org.radarbase.management.web.rest.errors

Class RadarWebApplicationException

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Throwable
java.lang.Exception
java.lang.RuntimeException
org.springframework.core.NestedRuntimeException
org.springframework.web.server.ResponseStatusException
org.radarbase.management.web.rest.errors.RadarWebApplicationException
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
BadRequestException, ConflictException, InvalidRequestException, InvalidStateException, NotFoundException, RequestGoneException
public class RadarWebApplicationException extends org.springframework.web.server.ResponseStatusException
A base parameterized exception, which can be translated on the client side.

For example:

throw new RadarWebApplicationException("Message to client", "entity", "error.errorCode")

can be translated with:

"error.myCustomError" : "The server says {{param0}} to {{param1}}"

See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • RadarWebApplicationException

      public RadarWebApplicationException(org.springframework.http.HttpStatus status, String message, String entityName, String errorCode)
      Create an exception with the given parameters. This will be used to to create response body of the request.
      Parameters:
      message - Error message to the client
      entityName - Entity related to the exception
      errorCode - error code defined in MP if relevant.

    • RadarWebApplicationException

      public RadarWebApplicationException(org.springframework.http.HttpStatus status, String message, String entityName, String errorCode, Map<String,String> params)
      A base parameterized exception, which can be translated on the client side.
      Parameters:
      status - HttpStatus code.
      message - message to client.
      entityName - entityRelated from EntityName
      errorCode - errorCode from ErrorConstants
      params - map of optional information.
